item.title: Teleport
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: If you have a distributed team that periodically gets together then you’ve asked yourself: Where should we meet? Provide Teleport with the location of each team member and it will return a list of suggestions based on travel time, number of non-stop flights, and total travel cost. I came across Teleport after I had suggested […]
item.content:encoded:
If you have a distributed team that periodically gets together then you’ve asked yourself: Where should we meet?

Provide Teleport with the location of each team member and it will return a list of suggestions based on travel time, number of non-stop flights, and total travel cost.

I came across Teleport after I had suggested that we build something like this internally at Automattic ( our teams travel regularly for meetups ). Nice to see that someone beat me to it.
